attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 with the following negotiating team immediately
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the UK government must carry out the call of the people who have spoken as a majority. We made the decision to leave the EU, we made this decision fairly, after years of campaigning as a democracy. The UK government must heed the call of the people and execute that decision by invoking Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty ASAP. The negotiating team assembled must categorically include Boris Johnson, Michael Gove, Daniel Hannan and Nigel Farage. The leading figureheads of the campaign.
attributes.background: We the people have made a democratic decision to remove ourselves from the European Union. We demand that this decision be carried out and executed immediately. Boris Johnson, Michael Gove, Daniel Hannan and Nigel Farage must be the negotiating team assembled for our transition to full independence.
